we should stop, for a long time now.

since we have been obsessed with the experiments.

that I made a time leap machine.

This is going to be big.

I thought you might have a fever
because you are saying un-assistant-like things!
I am not grateful to you.
What kind of tsundere is that?

and now you are talking about companions?

I am so stunned, I cannot speak.
Do not try to trip me up!
Pizza does not taste good cold.
Anyway, why are all three of them the same?

I was right to buy the ingredients, was not I?

the apple pie was just a failed attempt,
I guess sweet pickles will work.
When this meal is over, I am going to retire and get married.
Because I am a lab member.

I know more about you than you do.
and what you are going to do after this.

and I will give you the cherry on top.
